items.title: Microsoft blocks the Israeli military from some cloud and AI services
items.summary: Microsoft is blocking the Israeli military’s access to cloud and AI services that have been used in the mass surveillance of Palestinian civilians. items.title: Amazon will pay $2.5 billion to settle the FTC’s Prime lawsuit
items.summary: Amazon has agreed to pay $2.5 billion to settle a lawsuit from the Federal Trade Commission, which claimed it tricked millions of customers into subscribing to Prime and made it hard to cancel. Under the agreement, Amazon will pay a $1 billion civil penalty, along with $1.5 billion that it will pay back to an […]

items.title: Sarkozy's past catches up with him as French prison cell awaits
items.summary: PARIS (Reuters) -The grubby backroom deals and "bling bling" reputation that many French people have come to associate with Nicolas Sarkozy during his 2007-2012 presidency came back to haunt him on Thursday, as he became the first leader of modern-day France to face jail for a criminal conviction. items.summary:
LISEN 7,000mAh USB-C mini power bank

Buy for $18.50 (Up to Reg. $70)

Enter promo code VIWTMCFU for $18.50 off.

What we love

The new LISEN power bank is a handy pick if you want a compact battery pack for quick top-ups. It features a built-in Type-C connector that you can use to pair with a variety of devices, a 7,000mAh battery, a silicone cover to protect the connector, and even a small display that shows the remaining charge. What we also love about this model is that it lets you charge your phone without a cable, as the connector plugs directly into the Type-C port of your device.

items.title: This Anker 65W 3-port USB-C charger lets you tap into iPhone 17 fast charging for just $26 today
items.summary:
Anker Nano II 65W 3-port USB-C charger

Buy for $26 (Reg. $40)

What we love

This Anker 3-port 65W model is worth considering if you’re looking for a charger to unlock fast charging for the latest iPhone 17 models. It’s one of the more popular Anker chargers with two USB-C and a single USB-A port. The Type-C ports top out at 65W each, whereas the USB-A port goes up to 22.5W. You can even use all three ports simultaneously, though the overall output is shared in that case with the max speed topping out at 40W.

This particular config with Intel’s Core Ultra 7 processor and 32GB RAM typically goes for $2,050, so you’re looking at a straight-up $500 discount on it today. We saw the variant of this PC with 16GB RAM go for less earlier this month, but today’s offer delivers a better value for your money with a more powerful config. Dell is also matching the price of this Alienware PC at its website where you’ll find other configs of this machine discounted as well. Head below for more details.

more…
